xdsl_access_lns_ratelimit_description: Available only for France Telecom collections. Adjust the line’s high speed limit for OVHcloud hardware. This adjustment can make navigation easier, in some rare cases of packet loss.
xdsl_access_lns_ratelimit_warning: This operation can take up to 10 minutes and your connection will be interrupted for a few moments.
xdsl_access_lns_ratelimit_really_on: Are you sure you want to activate the line bandwidth limit?
xdsl_access_lns_ratelimit_really_off: Are you sure you want to deactivate the line bandwidth limit?
